content: >this lacy cowl is the perfect accent to any outfit adding a splash of colour and style in those fall and winter months skill level intermediate simply soft 170 g/6 oz 288 m/315 yds 1 ball version i autumn red 9730 version ii plum perfect 9761 crochet hook size us h-8 5mm or size to obtain gauge yarn needle stitch marker gauge 3 repeats and 11 row = 5 \ 12 5 cm in pat pattern repeat 4 rounds
